description: This file defines a utility class 'AuthUtil' that provides simple authorization checks based on roles. It includes methods to verify roles for admin or organizer privileges and to normalize role strings.

classes.name: AuthUtil
classes.description: A utility class for simple header/body-based authorization checks, designed as a mock authorization mechanism.

methods.name: requireOrganizerOrAdmin
methods.description: Checks whether the provided role permits admin or organizer privileges; throws exception if not authorized.

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Normalizes role strings by trimming and converting to uppercase.
